w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: AMA||ResultsAndDiscussion>>ClinicalSigns>>Headnotes>>Html
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p: [Discuss the incidence of behavioral effects or other clinical signs. Identify when during the study the effects were observed and whether the effects are considered treatment-related. Complete the table below, identifying each clinical sign observed on a separate row. Add rows as necessary.]

g:HTMLPanel.div: Table 15: Summary of Clinical Signs at Test Termination in [test organism].

Abbreviations: 1 Define any abbreviations used to identify clinical signs (i.e., sublethal effects, including behavioral effects) not specified elsewhere in the results. Examples include abnormal swimming behavior, lethargy, loss of equilibrium, curvature of the spine (e.g., "bent tail"), other malformations, lesions, etc. Add rows as necessary. Note that asynchronous development (unable to stage) is reported previously in Table 10 and not here.
